name: Robo Kitchen
description:
How to play:

You have to buy items, mix them and sell them to the customers. But you have to pay attention to the food because if  some food is in the ground for too long it will DECAY. Every 2 minutes you have to pay he rental of your restaurant and if you run out of money, you lose.

Controls: 

- Use WASD to move your character

- Left click to grab and release objects

- Left click to put items on the table and right click to pick items from the table

- E button to buy ingredients, to turn on the oven and to feed the customers
